text: The 1925-26 Austrian football championship was organized by the Vienna Football Association and played by its members. The single-track II. League served as a substructure to the I. League. These leagues were only open to professional football clubs. Wiener Amateur SV became champion for the second time. After the season they were renamed to FK Austria Wien. Other federal state associations organized state championships in different modes on an amateur basis. ==Final table== Table mode (if points are tied): Number of wins - goal quotient Pl.
